code: import{useState}from"react";import topicController from'../../../../controllers/TOPIC-controller';import InputWithError from'../../../../animations/input-error-field';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const optionsOfWhereIsProblem=await topicController.getListofWhereIsProblem();const ProblemLocationEnter=_ref=>{let{TOPIC,error}=_ref;const[localProblemLocation,setLocalProblemLocation]=useState("");const inputRadioCheck=e=>{TOPIC.problemLocation(e.value);};const isChecked=index=>{if(optionsOfWhereIsProblem.indexOf(TOPIC.problemLocation)===index){return true;}else{return false;}};const isCheckedUserInput=()=>{if(TOPIC.problemLocation===""||optionsOfWhereIsProblem.includes(TOPIC.problemLocation)){return false;}else{return true;}};const setValue=()=>{if(optionsOfWhereIsProblem.includes(TOPIC.problemLocation)){return"";}else{return TOPIC.problemLocation;}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"createTopic-phase",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"createTopic-phase-annotation",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"5/9"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\u0413\u0434\u0435 \u043F\u0440\u043E\u0431\u043B\u0435\u043C\u0430?"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"options-input",onChange:e=>inputRadioCheck(e.target),children:[optionsOfWhereIsProblem.map((item,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"radio",value:item,name:"check",checked:isChecked(index)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item})]},index);}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"radio",value:localProblemLocation,name:"check",checked:isCheckedUserInput()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputWithError,{placeholder:"Ваш вариант",value:setValue(),setValue:setLocalProblemLocation,error:error})]})]})]});};export default ProblemLocationEnter;
